name: City Island Chinese Restaurant
address: 84-86 City Island Ave, Bronx, NY 10464, USA

reviews.text: A wonderful "take out" Chinese Restaurant on City Island. The  Portions of food are very generous! Tasty and delicious. The prices are reasonable.Delivery always fast and on time with food pipping hot . We have been ordering from here for many years and have never got a bad meal . Also they deliver to South Minneford YC which is a plus ..when having friends over it's a great way to enjoy food on your boat ‚õµ
Food is good  1 stars only because they won't make certain things that's on the menu if they are busy un heard of!
One of my favorites,  I like Christy's too on Courtland and 158

Food is really good, but damn the lady that answers the phone always seems so angry.
I don't get it.
First time trying chinese food here and like the food here is pretty good here like they're fried chicken so crispy
These new people are no good ! Went there twice and no good !
Consistently good Chinese - one of the better Chinese Restaurants in the Bronx. Prices are reasonable, too. No Dining in - Takeout only.
Best Chinese food i ever had. No wonder they've been around for 23 years. Family owned restaurants. Everything was amazing
The woman is very Rude, avoid this place if you can.  Food is horrible as well
Quick call in service.  Food was good.
Good but pricey.
Got steamed chicken with a side of garlic sauce. Tasted good. A little expensive for what it was. 3-4 hours later I had horrible diarrhea and was on the toilet on and off all night.
Chinese
We love our local Chinese restaurant! Decent food comes with decent prices.
Food is the worst ..a good dose of food poisoning you get ...place is filthy inside ....went to the emergency room after eating there.
Great customer service. The food is typical American Chinese take away. They will only accept cash, nearest bank is Chase on your way there since the restaurant is on the southeast of the island.
The food sucks worst Chinese food in the bronx drive out the island or just save your money not worth a dime.
FOOD IS GREAT BUT THE WOMEN WHO WORKS THERE IS NASTY SHE DEMANDS THAT U DO THINGS A CERTAIN WAY CUSTOMERS ALWAYS RIGHT, YOU NEED TO LEARN HOW TO TALK TO PEOPLE OR YOU WILL LOSE BUSINESS...
Food taste great
Don‚Äôt order the shrimp with lobster sauce. It‚Äôs a waste of money.
Some of the best Chinese food around.
The food and prices are fine. Definitely order in advance or deliver, otherwise they are very slow. They also don't take credit card, which is ridiculous. Otherwise they would get a higher rating
The only chinese take out restaurant in city island,  my suggestion is if you can drive, get out of the island to have chinese food.
Great customer service, cash only
Food of good quality. Delivery can be slow at times.  With better delivery service could be three stars.
Good food, hot and on time, food tasted really good and the service was on point

Omg a turtle üê¢is faster than this place, two days ago I went to City Island to buy food and I passed by this Chinese restaurant; I ordered 2 half fried chicken üçó.  I waited more than 30 minutes just for an order of fried chicken maybe because City Island is a town and people are layback lol
But I cannot imagine if I would've had a large order If you go be willing to wait.
Note‚û°Ô∏è I ordered the Fried chicken üçówell done (crispy) because they staple the container plus I didn't check before leaving after I came home, the chicken were flavorless and white up; Not tasty at all.
I forgot to take a picture!
They charge you more than what‚Äôs on their menu when you ask for delivery
Good food fast service
Great food no grease and fresh taste.
Great
Great price, great food, big portions, and made in a timely manner!
Great food
I've ordered from this place a few times and it's always been good. They don't take credit cards cash only which im ok with. Lunch special does come with a lot of food. No complaints.
Great food
Really good.
A good place for anyone, whether living on or just visiting the island, who crave a helping of Chinese in the Bronx.
I love the price and it's the only one on the island
poor professionalism.
Food is usually pretty good
no heat in place..no lights...looks like last remodeling job was 1982....food was average and prices were good.
This place ALWAYS messes up on my orders..they can Never get an order right...the prices keep getting higher and the portions keep getting smaller...it's really not worth it...
Always very good

This is my go to place for great Chinese food in City Island.  I pop in here when I have business to do in the area.  My favorite dish is simple - pork fried rice and chicken wings!  The rice and chicken are never oily.  The food is‚Ä¶

The best Chinese food I have had in a while. Waited over a year to order there. Why? I don't know. Food was fresh. Not like most places where as soon as you hang up the doorbell rings. Very impressed. But then again, this is City Island. There's not a bad place to eat here. Will definitely order again.

Only Chinese food on the island, but it's good food. The prices are affordable and you get a lot of food, too. They would always quote us one price on the phone and it would be lower when they came to deliver it or we'd got to pick it up. That's always a nice surprise!
Reliable, fresh and very good Chinese food. We order and pick up food here every time we're on the island. Their Chow Fun, Mongolian Beef and Egg Foo Yung are the best! They are super fast too!

Come here only if you're in a pinch, you're craving Chinese food and don't feel like getting off the island.

As far as fast food, take-out Chinese goes, they're not terrible or horrible, but neither does the food come off as tasting fresh or decent quality. Every time I try the chicken chow mein, it feels like snot is rolling over my tongue. It's just not the right consistency.  The chicken tastes sub par and it's barely tender.  The fried rice tastes ok, but the quality is spotty. Sometimes it tastes just fine, other times it tastes like hardened little pieces of rice with no flavor.  The spring rolls have no crunch because the outer casing is spongy with grease and oil.

Bleh.  Maybe I should have given this place 1 star.
I order from here a few times a week and the food is consistently good. The service is the best part though, they're fast and always remember my order/address with no issues.

I've had a few things from there but I swear they cook good for whom they want once I ordered chicken and broccoli and that was great then I ordered just broccoli and white rice sauce was watery never tasted the same as the broccoli
The same price as most Chinese restaurants in the city, but unpalatably better taste and quality of food. Good service too, ideal for takeout.
Love this place. Pricing is good, food is always fresh & tasty üëåüèæüëåüèæüëåüèæ‚Ä¶
The food here is great. The shrimp is fresh.
Great fresh food, but it was freezing in the restaurant
Great fried rice. Really good food in general.
Only chinese place on the island. Not bad. I actually like it
They do not take credit or debit cards. The food could be a bit more palitable.
Decent... We was still hungry after Sammy's fish box
If you live on city island this is the only game in town. They serve food on par with other Chinese places off island
I liked it better in the 80's , now its less inviting
Large portions  great taste
